title: Vitreous Glass Inc. Announces Dividend
text:
( Not for Dissemination to the US or to US Newswires)
AIRDRIE, Alberta, April 13, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Vitreous Glass Inc. (the “ Corporation ”) is pleased to announce that the Corporation declared a cash dividend (the “ Dividend ”) today of $0.08 per common share to be paid on May 15, 2018 to the shareholders of record as of the close of business on May 1, 2018. Although this is a special Dividend, depending on the results of business, the Corporation hopes to be able to continue to pay dividends on a regular basis.
The Dividend is considered an “eligible dividend” for tax purposes.
The Corporation had approximately 6,283,667 common shares issued and outstanding as at April 12, 2018.
